createdTimestamp.description: Gets the timestamp marking arcAgent creation.

updatedTimestamp.description: Gets the timestamp marking last updated on the arcAgent.

certPublicKey.description: Gets or sets the arcAgent certificate public key.

serviceEndpoint.description: Gets the Endpoint at which the agent can call service REST API.

lastHeartBeatUtc.description: Gets the last heartbeat time of the site in UTC.

version.description: Gets the version of the arcAgent.

provisioningState.description: Gets or sets the provisioning state.

tags.description: Gets or sets the Resource tags.

type.description: Gets or sets the type of the resource.

nextLink.description: Url to follow for getting next page of ArcAgents.

HybridConnection.description: The result of a get hybrid connection.

connectionString.description: Gets or sets the connection string.

vCenterId.description: Gets or sets the ARM Id of the vCenter resource in which this image resides.

moRefId.description: Gets or sets the vCenter MoRef (Managed Object Reference) ID for the image.

provisioningState.description: Gets or sets the provisioning state.

tags.description: Gets or sets the Resource tags.

type.description: Gets or sets the type of the resource.

nextLink.description: Url to follow for getting next page of Images.

ResourcePatch.description: Object containing updates for patch operations.

moRefId.description: Gets or sets the vCenter MoRef (Managed Object Reference) ID for the resource pool.

type.description: Gets or sets the type of the resource.

createdTimestamp.description: Gets the timestamp marking run as account creation.

updatedTimestamp.description: Gets the timestamp marking last updated on the run as account.

accountId.description: Gets or sets the id of the on-premise runasaccount that maps to this account representation in Azure.

displayName.description: Gets or sets the displayName for the runasaccount.

type.description: Gets or sets the type of the resource.

nextLink.description: Url to follow for getting next page of runasaccounts.

createdTimestamp.description: Gets the timestamp marking vCenter creation.

updatedTimestamp.description: Gets the timestamp marking last updated on the vCenter.

fqdn.description: Gets or sets the FQDN/IPAddress of the vCenter.

port.description: Gets or sets the port of the vCenter.

runAsAccountId.description: Gets or sets the ARM Id of the run as account Id of the vCenter.

version.description: Gets the version of the vCenter.

instanceUuid.description: Gets the instance UUID of the vCenter.

provisioningState.description: Gets or sets the provisioning state.

tags.description: Gets or sets the Resource tags.

type.description: Gets or sets the type of the resource.

nextLink.description: Url to follow for getting next page of VCenters.

OsType.description: Defines the different types of VM guest operating systems.

memorySizeInMB.description: Gets or sets memory size in MBs for the vm.

numberOfCores.description: Gets or sets the number of cores for the vm.

resourcePoolId.description:
Gets or sets the ARM Id of the resourcePool resource on which this virtual machine will
deploy.

templateId.description: Gets or sets the ARM Id of the template resource to deploy the virtual machine.

networkId.description: Gets or sets the ARM Id of the network resource to connect the virtual machine.

imageId.description: Gets or sets the ARM Id of the image resource to deploy the virtual machine.

moRefId.description: Gets or sets the vCenter MoRef (Managed Object Reference) ID for the virtual machine.

powerStatus.description: Gets the powerstatus of the virtual machine.

provisioningState.description: Gets or sets the provisioning state.

tags.description: Gets or sets the Resource tags.

type.description: Gets or sets the type of the resource.

nextLink.description: Url to follow for getting next page of VirtualMachines.

Gets or sets the vCenter MoRef (Managed Object Reference) ID for the virtual machine
template.
